About


Ciao! This is the personal webpage of Sushrut Thorat.
Now that you are here, I assume you want to know about me.

Let's start with the academic introduction:

  • Masters student in Cognitive Neuroscience
    • At CIMeC, University of Trento, Italy
    • Onwards to the second year
    • Currently working with the Peelen lab.
  • Research interests:
    • The properties of information representation in the brain
    • The nature of personal identity and subjective experience
    • Biological Neural Nets equivalent to Artificial Neural Nets
    • Unsupervised Learning in Artificial Neural Nets

Further academically-relevant information can be found in my CV. I am currently working on projects related to my research interests. The projects page contains short summaries of my past and current projects. My publications and preprints can be found on Google Scholar.

In case you were wondering, martis - i am srt (that's my full name).

Now, about the blog. I'll blog about the green screens of my projects, half-baked but interesting ideas, and other random stuff which might come in handy. To keep things organised, I'll tag the posts.

I occasionally write short stories and poems. They can be found at Meadows. I don't make any claims about their "beauty" though.

A quote which appeals to me in all situations -
"Float like a butterfly, sting like a bee; rumble, young man. Rumble." ~ M. Ali

I am active on Twitter and Quora. Feel free to connect there, or drop a mail.

Thanks for reading!
